Title: You Kill Me
Plot: Hodges stages hypothetical murders in the lab in order to give his fellow lab techs a chance to play CSI, but unbenownst to them he has other motives behind his actions.  Meanwhile, after Sara's farewell, everyone tries to comfort Grissom.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Liz Vassey, Sheeri Rappaport, Jon Wellner, Gerald McCullouch
